description: An editor and enhancer - the best of both worlds!

I like the free open source Lightzone raw convertor and find it easy to use. It uses dcraw for camera raw conversions. It uses Ansel Adams zone system as a way of adjusting each portion of the histogram, from darks to lights. It has blending modes allowing a wide variety of contrasting. While it doesn't have a lot programming help, the main developer is very skilled.
